name: Echo Vr (itch)
description:
Further developed project based on the Prototype "Find your way home" that was produced during the Global VR Hackathon 2017 in Graz.
Improvements include stable 60fps performance, inclusion of baked shadows and new gameplay objectives and some new assets.
*Note that all assets here are placeholders, and this prototype is merely designed to improve the underlying codebase and mechanics. The final game is currently in production but at such an early stage that we can't share a playable build.
